lyrics.text:
Ko kimoutolu na
Kuo mou lava’i,
Hono Laumālie
Ke mou mo’ui ai;
‘O fai fakaalafia
Ki homou ‘Eiki ko Sīsū.

‘E vave homou hū
‘I he fu’u matapā,
Pea mou mo’ui
Mo homou ‘Otua;
Mama’o mei he mamahi
‘I he fiefia lahi.

Pea ke tau fai
Ke tau fakaongo,
Ki he me’a lea
Kuo faka’ilo;
Ko hono faka’ilonga
Ki he kakai ‘oku tui.

Ke tau fa’a vakai
Ki he hā’ele mai,
‘A e ‘Eiki lelei
‘Ofa ke ne ‘ilo
‘I he’ene hā’ele mai
‘Oku tau tali teu pē.
